ing: 1 tablespoon raw sesame seeds, or to taste
des: "This dish can be heated in a dehydrator if you want warmer uncooked fried rice."
ins:
Grate celery root into a bowl.
Pulse pecans and garlic together in the bowl of a food processor until ground.
Stir pecan mixture into celery root. Add broccoli, Nama Shoyu, olive oil, sesame seeds, pepper, and salt; toss to combine.
